titleStmt.title: A prophecie lately transcribed from an old manuscript of Doctor Barnaby Googe that lived in the reign of Qu. Elizabeth predicting the rising, meridian, and falling condition of the states of the United Provinces, which started up immediately after the appearance of the new star in Cassiopœia : in which prophecie it is predicted, that that state will suddenly be brought to that mean and low condition they were in about an hundred years since.
titleStmt.author: Googe, Barnabe, 1540-1594.
